Microsmile is the best place with spiritual effect I got very smooth treatment by our Dr. Praveen Rajesh. I got a best root canal treatment by our doctor with smile100‚ÑÖ I got my smile. The crown fixing  done by Dr. Jagrathi  she is so friendly and did a great work within few minutes without pain she get back my teeth with best crown. I really appreciate the team work. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Tooth Air Polishing,Dental Cleaning,
review:
Treatment Done: 2 RCTs, 2 CAPS, and Teeth Deep Cleaning

Location: 5/5
Ambiance: 5/5
Clinic: 5/5 - State of the art equipment and also high-quality chems
Service: 5/5
Post Treatment Follow-up: 5/5
Cost: 5/5 (A little out of my budget, but usual charges only. Not expensive)
Car Parking: Available(Check once before you book an appointment)
Appointment: 5/5 
Duration of Treatment: 4.5/5 ****** **** ******** *******
Pain-level during and after treatment: 4.5/5 (Trust me, my tolerance levels are low)
Music During treatment: Self DJ :p

It was during the lock down I had visited the clinic. I'm sure Dr. Kritika would vouch for the situation in which I had come. Though they were handling another patient, Dr. Praveen quickly helped in arresting the shooting pain first so that he could finish with the other patient in the meantime. 

Once it was my turn, Praveen attended my case. 

Firstly, I had visited because of a shooting pain in the decayed teeth which I was prolonging the pain using the usual pain killers. Once it was time I couldn't prolong it anymore, I decided that i'll see a dentist. 

Praveen carefully examined my case and using his gizmos showed on the bigger screen the condition of my teeth. (P.S. He is also a dental photographer so ask for nice pics of your teeth later). He identified that I needed two RCTs and some filling for the slightly decayed teeth. 

The treatment was a step by step procedure which got done in 3 sittings and 1 sitting for the caps. Again, 3 sittings is because i had a huge amount of puss which had to subside so that he could continue with the RCT. 

Post RCT, the caps were put on and had to come another day to check on the positioning of the caps. 

I still have my fillings, one extraction and two implants to be done yet.. so will write about that in the next review. 

Also, they maintain all your records on the cloud, so in case you are else where and you need your reports/records, they would be glad to share it with you/the dentist. 

Dr. Praveen: Chilled out doc. Charming personality. (P.S.: Sorry girls, he is taken) Patiently explains the procedure. Shows the pictures and videos of the treatment (Pre&Post). Doesn't beat around the bush but is straight out in telling you what is the best. More than timely resolution which most of the dentists do, Praveen is more of a preventive care specialist. He not only sorts out the issue but also focuses more on the preventive part so that you don't have to come back again with a bigger problem. 

Dr. Kritika: Super cool doctor. Though she didn't attend my case (She is a Pediatric Dentist), she was there throughout. It was super fun. 

It was actually super fun. It was more like I came there to hang out with two of my friends and it was all laughter and enjoyment throughout.
reply_text: Wow, this is probably the most elaborate and detailed feedback we have ever received. Thank you for the time you have invested in giving us this feedback. We would love to see you for your follow up AbhisheküòÉ

They do wonders I‚Äôm so happy
Very friendly doctor explained the issue and t treatment approach very nicely.. The clinic is done very nicely to suit children

review: Dr Praveen & Kirthiga are very experienced doctors and sensitive to patient's needs. They handle team of experienced doctors and assistants. Their procedures are painless and performed using modern scientific techniques. I recommend people reading this to approach their clinic for your dental issues. You will be surely satisfied.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited for Tooth scaling and polishing

I had an amazing experience with Dr.Praveen Rajesh and Dr. Swarna. This visit was for me where I had severe gum problems with pain and bleeding. 

Dr.Praveen Rajesh listened to my problem very calmly and examined my tooth and explained that it is due to Hard plaque formation on the gums, he clearly explained what treatment he is going to do. I was very scared to visit a dentist and kept postponed many years because the pain which I underwent during my childhood days is unforgettable. Dr.Praveen understood my fear and suggested a Nitrous oxide sedation method which made me more comfortable so that we don‚Äôt get anxious.

Dr.Swarna did the procedure and no pain was experienced during the entire procedure. I got my teeth back as to how it was before. She is a brilliant dentist, with utmost compassion towards the comfort of me.

She also explained the brushing techniques and showed the before and after treatment photos which makes it very clear for me to understand and witness the results. She is just brilliant and a master of her trade and I highly recommend her.

The clinic is very neat and well maintained. Appointments well in time and completed the procedure on time. Highly professional with great expertise. 

Thank you Microsmiles for giving me back my SMILE.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had partially broken tooth and was scared of the pain during the treatment. In Two teeth filling had come out and also had sensitivity in many tooth..
Dr.Praveen gave me confidence that he can provide me treatment with minimum pain..I was totally impressed by the ambience and the moment sat in the dental chair, I felt  very comfortable. 
After careful examination of my teeth & quick X-Ray , Dr. Praveen explained me in a very simple way about the problems in my teeth and his treatment plan.. I was totally convinced and agreed for the treatment, as suggested by him.. he filled three teeth in such a short duration, totally painless.. Also cleaned my teeth with his advanced new tool, which was quick and no pain. I was surprised that he completed my entire treatment within an hour, which otherwise would have taken minimum three sittings in my earlier dental clinics..
With the melodious music in the background and comfortable sky view chair, it was an enjoyable experience than treatment., Rather I would say it is like a dental spa.. I recommend Doctor Praveen for all age groups who are in need of painless and apt treatment for their dental problems in a very comfortable and wonderful ambience in less time

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Surgical Tooth Extraction,Dental Fillings,Periodontal Flap Surgery,Bleeding Gums Treatment,Dental Checkup (General),
review:
Thanks, Head of Micro Smiles Dr.Praveen Rajesh and supporting team professionals for bringing back my smile under a pandemic situation for complete dental restoration. My googling ended up here after seeing the positive reviews, academic and professional excellence of Dr. Praveen
Rajesh. The clinic is maintained very well, sanitized, stringently adhere to the COVID-19 health and safety protocols. The clinic provides the latest state of art lab facilities with microscopic and digital imaging for precise surgery with less pain. 

The treatment involves fractured tooth bone removal, root canal, cavity filling, gum inspection, deep cleaning, and proposed gum graft surgery by a periodontist. During the diagnostic procedure, he patiently interacts with the patient about their present dental issues with an affordable solution for complete dental restoration in detail. He associates with eminent professors and doctors from premier medical universities for providing a unique specialisation solution on a case to case basis.

The ambiance and the professional handlining with ease will make you more comfortable and relaxed. Overall it is a good experience and recommends the internationally trained Dr. Praveen
Rajesh of Micro Smiles.

Dr. Praveen and Dr. Kirthiga- 2 dentists here at Mircrosmiles having a vision and giving their best to provide excellent dental care in Bangalore!!
I visited Dr. Praveen seeking help for an infected RCT and very bad sensitivity for a composite filled tooth. I was so hesitant to approach any dentist in Bangalore after a very bad experience for my first RCT and I didn't get enough guidance and support from the previous doc. But since, it was difficult for me to travel to native often for the n number of sittings for RCT, I searched for a dentist in Bangalore and Practo led me to Dr. Praveen. ***** ** ** *** **** ******* ** ********* * **** **** ******* He explained the condition in detail and what treatment should be carried out in order to tackle the issue. He assured that nothing will go wrong and imparted confidence at every step in the process. Re-rct is done successfully. Gum trimming- well it's healing now. Many many thanks doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have taken my Father in law (>60yrs) for Root canal treatment. He was delaying his treatment due to Gag reflex issue as he did not find a right doctor. Dr.Praveen addressed this so professionally & patiently. He made extra time to take care of his special requirements. Really Thankful to him.He assured him that everything will go smoothly. His treatment was done in 2 sittings. Dr identified few other related issues & addressed them timely & efficiently. Really lucky to find the right Doctor & Clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Praveen was very methodical in analyzing my dental issues and provide the correct course of action. He uses state of art techniques to give the best care to his patients. This was very evident when he decided to save one of my decayed teeth and use a Fibre composite and reconstruct the teeth which had adverse issues, and infected root canals. His perfection esp in the entire RCT process and crown alignment is something I hadn't seen in a dentist. His patience and the post op care deserves a special mention ! Thanks to Dr. RAJESH I can travel to US in peace !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had visited Microsmiles with severe pain in one of my tooth, they took photos and x-rays to find out the cause and Dr.Praveen explained it in detail and performed the treatment required with absolutely no pain and the sisters Ms.Ambika & Ms.kowsalya were very considerate about my comfort. The clinic is maintained so well, very hygienic. The front desk Ms.Keerthi called me after every appointment to check how I'm doing, which was very impressive.  Thanks to the entire team for making my dental treatment go seamless!! I would definitely recommend Microsmiles!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Wonderful service provided by Microsmiles Dental care. I went for my dental treatment, initially I was searching for good dental clinic in Chennai. After that I found this clinic.  I had my dental treatment very comfortable and safely. Dr. Praveen Rajesh is my doctor, he explained me very detailed information about my dental issue. He also provides the best solution for my dental problems. Thanks for your best service Dr. Praveen. I recommend this dental clinic for all of you. Now, he is my favourite dental Doctor. I really liked the way of explaining the solution.  Dr. Praveen is very friendly *** *************. Thank you again for your great service Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My best dental experience so far. I went to Dr. Praveen for a deep filling and a regular filling. Due to the deep nature of the filling, Bone graft followed by a filling was done by Dr. Praveen. The filling was done under a microscope which enabled minimum loss of tooth structure due to precision. I had no pain during the process. Photographs of each stage of the process were also shared with me. Dr. Praveen also explained in detail the all the other problems I had in my other teeth and their solutions. Definitely recommend very highly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I got 5 fillings done and scaling treatment also - since I have sensitive gums... I was concerned about the pain of the procedure and the anesthetic injections....I opted for the conscious sedation - where you just inhale in the gas for a few minutes and you feel a little sleepy and relaxed  and there is no anxiety or pain while the dentist completes the procedure - for me the procedure was very smooth. The gas is not harmful - they use it for children also - I was able to drive immediately after the procedure. It was a pain free, relaxed option and all the procedures were completed in a single sitting. There was no discomfort and I resumed a normal diet. I would wholeheartedly recommend this sedation option  to anyone who is anxious or nervous about getting dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** *** *** **** ****** ********. Dr. Praveen Rajesh is a talented dentist and provides apt solutions for all our dental problems in a friendly manner. Not overpriced. I am 100% satisfied with treatment provided by Dr. Praveen Rajesh and total Microsmiles team. Kudos and good luck to Microsmiles...üòä Very friendly and professional. Thank you Dr. Praveen Rajesh for you magical painless perfect treatment. ü§ùWould definitely recommend this doctor for all your dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went to microsmiles dental care for general check up and teeth cleaning and met Dr. Praveen.
He was very friendly and  took the time to thoroughly examine my condition and also photograph all my teeth and show the exact places I was having sensitivity issues due to early development stage of cavity which I was not aware of and was promptly treated for it.
Very nice ambiance so I also brought my parents for their check up.
Prices are also very reasonable for the excellent infrastructure and service üòÄ

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Praveen clearly informed me the options during consultation.  The options were Root Canal or taking out the tooth.  I opted for RCT.  Mine was a little bit advanced but the clinic has all the tools to do a quality job. Overall I am very happy with the outcome.  The only improvement suggestion is that if a clear process explanation such as grinding to remove affected portion, tooth strengthening, gum treatment, capping is given, it will be more helpful for a layman like me who does not have any knowledge of the process.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Microscope Assisted Root Canal Treatment,Dental Fillings,Dental Cavity Filling,Scaling / Polishing,
review: I visited Microsmiles Dental Care through Google for my root canal treatment and I must tell you, it is the best dental clinic I have ever been. Very good professionalism from dentists to assistants & admin in ensuring the comfort of the patient during &  after the treatment.They make all things simple for you to understand about the dental hygiene.I thank doctor Dr.Praveen Rajesh sir for your best service. I Would suggest & recommend Microsmiles Dental Care to all my friends, relatives & neighborhood.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** **** ****** ****** **** **** **** *** I was having dental issues for the past 6-7 years and none of my dental appointments worked out in the past. My visit to Dr. Praveen Rajesh was a relief from long term pain. 

The best part of the treatment was his patience towards my pain, his explanations about every small procedure so that you know what‚Äôs happening and most importantly, the pain free treatment in itself. The treatment was stretched over multiple sittings due to my sensitivity and the doctor was kind enough to accommodate it. 

I would 100% recommend this to anyone looking for a dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Praveen Rajesh is the ideal dentist,the answer to my prayers.I had many dental problems but kept postponing because I didn't know which dentist would give me effective and pain free treatment.The moment I met him I knew that I had come to the right place,the right person,the right dentist.He was reassuring,gave me confidence.It was incredible-a root canal without any pain!! Henceforth my whole family will come here only for all our dental work.The ambience of the clinic is superb,of international standards,thank you Dr Praveen.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: From a root canal treatment many years ago, few pieces of the file used were left behind, which I started experiencing pain and approached Dr. Praveen. His diagnosis and treatment was excellent. He took time to explain in detail what the problem was and how this would be treated. He updated me on the progress with pictures and videos on the job done and how we are fairing. I am very happy and satisfied with the results of the treatment. I would recommend Dr. Praveen to anyone who needs such a treatment. Thank You Dr. Praveen!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Visited Dr. Praveen for scaling and cleaning. 

Highlights of the visit:

1:Detailed before and after the procedure photographs to show the work done
2: Very professional and explained further optional procedures and best practices for dental hygiene
3: Suggested sedation through N2O gas to minimize discomfort during the procedure. This is a gamechanger for people with sensitive teeth  
4: Doctor is very friendly and makes a genuine effort to put the patient at ease before and during the procedure
5: Neat and warm clinic
6: Patient's choice of music during the procedure was a nice touch

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had root canal treatment done by Dr. Praveen. I must say first time I was given full explanation of my dental issues and treatment by a dentist. Quite surprised with the length of details shared by the doctor and scan of my own teeth shown. Helped me to understand the complete issue and recommendations for treatment. Doctor was very transparent with the suggested treatment and cost involved. The entire process was painless and did not face any issue post the treatment as well as between the 2 sittings. Ambience is very good and calming. surprised by the questions asked on the choice of music as later realized this was being played at the background while the treatment was on üòÄ. Dr. Praveen was quite engaging and created a comfortable atmosphere. Definitely recommend the place for a great experience. I would be visiting for future treatments as well as for my family when needed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Most important at times like these, the clinic is really well maintained and hygienic, following all COVID norms and providing proper PPE Kit. The modern day equipment like detailed photo capturing to diagnose, Displaying it on TV, made sure that even smallest details are given proper attention.

Dr. Praveen explained the whole process patiently, in layman terms and made sure that the whole procedure is painless and to perfection. All in all, would definitely recommend Microsmiles to my friends and family. Kudos team!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The overall experience is very patient-engaging and I am satisfied with the overall experience.I visited the doctor for a general dental-checkup. After thorough check-up, the doctor gave me suggestions regarding my course of treatment by showing me photos of all my teeth and explaining all the issues that need to be addressed. This gave me a chance to understand issues myself and the final decision to pursue the choice of course of treatment was left to me - which is highly appreciated.My treatment was split into two parts - First Day - dental checkup and consultation   cleaning   plaque removal   stain removal. Second Day - Cavities filling   Composite Fillings.All the treatments were swiftly finished with minimum discomfort. Following the treatment, all the necessary precautions as well as general dental-hygeine steps were recommended.All the necessary covid precautions are being taken - Sanitizers, foot-covers.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
I have tried multiple dentists before visiting microsmiles and all my previous experiences ended in pain or vain.! 
At microsmiles every process is carefully designed to deliver top notch quality treatments and patient care. In my dental procedure with Microsmiles, Dr. Parveen Rajesh carefully studied my teeth, he identified the root cause of the issue and using dental photography he patiently explained me how we can treat it, the appointments are managed so well by the team, the pleasant environment, latest dental techniques put to use, advanced equipments and above all the passion with which the Doctor and his team works made my sessions very comfortable. Last week I completed my treatment and now I am back with strong teeth üòÉ Thanks to Microsmiles

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: First of all I felt safe entering MIcrosmiles during this pandemic time, due to the hygiene practices there.  Dr. Rajesh is very amicable and made me feel  relaxed and confident during the entire process  of RCT. He explained  using rays and photos taken , the condition of the tooth and kept me informed on the  process he was adopting .  Also the choice of the cap was left to me after explaining the pros and cons of the ceramic Vs metal Vs ceramic+metal cap. The post treatment follow-up every time I visit the clinic gives a caring touch. So definitely recommend Dr. Rajesh for his good work  employing the latest technology.
reply_text: Thank you maamüòä we love to work with well informed patients like you who truly understand the care we put into everything we do. Have a great day

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had been to microsmiles to check and treat a sudden shooting pain which I was getting while grinding any slightly harder food. Dr. Praveen checked and filled a tooth in the upper jaw. Also felt a  crack in the lower tooth. It was only visible  with a x-ray .
Dr.Praveen is very professional and most friendly. He made me feel very relaxed before and during the procedure. During the procedure he was stopping often to check if I was feeling any discomfort.  He had explained what he was going to do and took photographs  at different stages and confirmed to me that what ever explained was done. 
Clinic was following strict covid precautions.
Repeated reminders in sms were sent for the follow up appointments. He had to complete the procedure in 3 sittings. 
No more tooth pain and am able to munch and have my food without any discomfort. 
I will recommend Dr.Praveen to  any one who is having dental problems.  Especially if he/she  wants to have a route canal done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Went for root canal treatment to Dr Paveen. He is a very humble personality, patient listener and gives a detailed picture of the dental issue which we are facing. Doctor even takes pics of our teeth and shows it to us on big screen which is really nice. Based on the issue, he explains a step by step plan which he intends to follow as treatment so that we are not kept in the dark. 

Respects our expectations from the treatment and accordingly suggests from best to affordable treatment plans and gives the pros and cons of each treatment so that we can choose the best one suitable for us.

Had a very good experience and feeling satisfied with the professionalism shown by doctor. Thank you Dr Praveen for such a quality treatment.

review: Dr. Praveen was kind to answer my queries regarding cavities, fillings, & RCT. We went through all the options on the table before doing RCT - Efficacy/drawbacks/nerve response to deep filling. Explored Composite, Onlay, or Crown which one would be the best fit with the constraint of protecting the tooth structure. The staff is very friendly & respectful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Loved the experience with doctors - Dr. Praveen and Doctor who did the cleaning part, reception and everything. However, i was feeling a bit uncomfortable with the nurses stepping out and coming back in middle of the cleaning and scaling process, it made me a bit anxious about the hand sanitization. It would be great if the gloves of the healthcare workers are replaced after using wash room. Just an advice as there could be peeps with contamination anxiety :)
reply_text: Thank you Teja for your feedback üòä we generally have 2 nurses to help for one doctor. Only one is allowed to step out if needed to get additional instruments, however they will be de gloving and sanitising before touching any other article. Infact we have a detailed training program for our assistants in this regardüòä however we have noted your concern and appreciate your time and trust in us to explain it, thank you sir üòä

review:
I would highly recommend Dr. Praveen Rajesh. The way of explaining the issues briefly by showing the pictures of affected teeth, it was appreciatable and I never seen such examination from any doctors. The end result of treatment was amazing, as it was one what I exactly expected. Apart from treatment, clinic ambience was  pleasant, all necessary covid precautions are being taken such as sanitized equipment, foot covers, etc.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: My father had severe tooth ache for weeks.  He is a diabetic patient and he was quiet hesitant to see a dentist, except for normal cleaning.   I told him that Dr. Praveen will take care of him and to trust him.   Doctor made him feel more comfortable, explained him the complete procedure, and did his root canals with ease.   He also got a comfortable cap and he says he feels very comfortable with it.   With no second thought, I would recommend Dr. Praveen to my friends for any kind of oral care.
